Keep each section concise but informative, suitable for a morning email digest.

buildPhases.description: Initiates the daily workflow execution every morning at 8 AM using a scheduled trigger to start the content aggregation process.
Simultaneously collects content from multiple sources including Reddit posts from 5 subreddits, RSS feeds from 3 industry blogs, and Google trending topics analysis.
Combines all collected data streams from Reddit, RSS feeds, and Google trends into a single unified dataset for processing.
Uses OpenAI to analyze and summarize the aggregated content into a concise, engaging daily digest formatted as a newsletter.
Sends the final AI-generated summary as a 'What's New Today' email digest to the specified recipients.
